"Become what you pretend to be."

 MASK is a collection of virtual reality wearables
that explores the shift of identity 


Here I shared what I explored and created:
Ideation. Graphics. Physical computation. Fabrication.

Enjoy creating new You with MASK, and overcoming the thing you want to overcome
